page.title: 14WEST COKER AREA RELIGION
page.content: RECENTLY THE PARISHES OF WEST COKER EAST CHINNOCK AND HARDINGTON WERE COMBINED AND NOW ONLY HAVE ONE CLERGYMAN FOR ALL CHURCHES.THIS HAS MEANT EXTA WORK FOR LOCAL RECTOR WHO LIVES IN WEST COKER. THERE ARE 8 SERVICES A WEEK IN THE THREE CHURCHES. ON AVERAGE 75 PEOPLE ATTEND WEST COKER 35 ATTEND EAST CHINNOCK AND 26 ATTEND HARDINGTON CHURCHES EACH WEEK. THERE IS A COMBINED CHOIR WITH ABOUT 20 MEMBERS. LAST YEAR THERE WERE 3 WEDDINGS AT COKER,AND 1 AT CHINNOCK.THERE WERE 10 BABTISMS AT COKER,3 AT HARDINGTON,AND 3 AT CHINNOCK.THERE WERE 12 FUNERALS IN THE THREE CHURCHES. THE VICAR WORKS 6 DAYS A WEEK,VISITING SICK,OR PEOPLE IN DIFFICULTY OR HAVING MEETINGS. HE THINKS THE CHURCH WILL HAVE EVEN LESS CLERGY IN THE FUTURE.
